ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 576
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The lizards seem to be different.  My guess is invis in there only works like a (very) reduced aggro radius, or depends on direction (like sneak).  I never
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 8 Dec 1999, James Schuldes wrote:
>
> I took Double into CT to help him kill some stuff in the CY for some fast
> xp. We got bored and decided to take a peak at the Tae Room. I told him to
> be careful cuz I noticed that the hulking gorillas conned blue to me at 37.
> He told me "nothing in here sees thru invis..." We watched a party clear the
> room and were standing around after the battle. Three Fanatics spawned or
> walked thru and immediately agro'd him (and killed him) - although he said
> he conned them indifferent.

The lizards seem to be different. My guess is invis in there
only works like a (very) reduced aggro radius, or depends on
direction (like sneak). I never got a chance to experiment
with it much because by the time the defenders wouldn't beat
me silly, I was high enough level that the effect seemed to go
away, and invis has been reliable ever since.
--
John H. Kim
kim@...
